name: QPhiX
tagline: QCD for Intel Xeon Phi and Xeon processors
body:
### QPhiX: QCD for Intel Xeon Phi and Xeon Processors
This is the project web site for the QPhiX library, which provides support for QCD solvers
on Xeon Phi and Xeon processors.

This project uses code kernels generated by the [QPhiX Code Generator](https://jeffersonlab.github.io/qphix-codegen)

### Source Code
You can obtain QPhiX by clicking the download buttons on this page.

You can go directly to the GitHub pages by visiting: https://github.com/JeffersonLab/qphix.git 

### Support or Contact
Please contact Balint Joo: bjoo@jlab.org
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
